snippet.title: Dinosaur: Resurrection - Opening (subtitled)
snippet.description:
Enable captions for English subtitles.

This is the opening FMV to the Falcom-developed Japanese PC game "Dinosaur: Resurrection," with its brief dialogue scenes translated by me and subtitled via YouTube captions.

The music used here is titled "The Lost Ones" or "Those Who Are Lost" in translation, and is available both in its original form and arranged on the Dinosaur: Resurrection Original Soundtrack.

I absolutely love this opening - it's probably one of my favorite Falcom game openings, to one of Falcom's most unique games - so I hope you enjoy this brief look into awesome obscurity! (:
